title: Similar typeface style?
content:
I particular like this Kranji typeface. Is there any english typeface with similar style as this one?   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050825104202im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/4100/41629.jpg)
author: illusime

comments.content: Post your question to the Type Identification section and you will get some quick answers.

I can't think of any suggestion, sorry.   
And BTW, those letters are Hiragana, not Kanji.
